item.title: Once in a Blue Moon
item.description:
Once in a Blue Moon

I used to fly a lot and I absolutely loved it, even if the waiting to be boarded might have been tedious and sometimes you had someone strange sitting next to you, I always made sure to book a window seat.

item.title: Don’t we all long for something?
item.description:
Don’t we all long for something?

I mostly long for happiness and I know it can be achieved, though just like the little red poppy flowers on the summer fields or the mist in the mountains on a colder morning, it's nothing that is permanent. If you want to experience it, you will have to do something for it, like getting up early.
